name: Planet Royale
description:
Background
You received an invitation to a royal battle from the planet DH-ATL, you are tasked with facing off against 9 others for the title of Space King. Fight for survival and victory on unstable, shrinking planets.

Can you get more than a 10 win streak and the title of Space King?

Features

  • A single player battle royale on a shrinking planet!
  • Super intelligent artificial intelligence!
  • Bullets block other bullets! (Yes it’s a feature now)
  • Sprint to escape and survive!
  • Gather resources to unlock a cast of wild playable space characters, like Space Steve, Gary, and Evil Gary!
  • Undiscovered planets, an infinite universe!

Credits
Planet Royale created for Dreamhack Atlanta Gamejam 2018

Music by bensound.com & zapsplat.com

ReadyMajor Games is
MajorPest & Red1m3n

Thanks for playing
